name: Bunslinger at High Noon
description:
In an alternate early 2000s,  a fast food chain commissioned a game for the Nokia 3310, starring their cowboy-themed mascot. This is that game.

Bunslinger at High Noon is an fast-paced, arcade-style fast food sim, made for submission to Nokia Jam 5

This game controls entirely using number keys (both number row and numpad), to loosely emulate the controls available on a 3310

(as a bonus, holding shift and pressing 1-3 will change the colour palette)

Assets used:
'Tiny' font and Nokia 3310 audio samples were sourced from: https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresource
'High Noon' by damieng: https://damieng.com/typography/zx-origins/high-noon/
